messages.subject: Re: Help with a Movie title
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! Can you understand Japanese and do you have (or have access to) a region 2 DVD player?  If so, I may be able to find it in Japan. Just let me know, av98us
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
Can you understand Japanese and do you have (or have access to) a
region 2 DVD player? If so, I may be able to find it in Japan.
Just let me know,
av98us
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Scott <scottc_4@h...>"
<scottc_4@h...> wrote:
> Awhile back I saw a movie that I saw was entitled Heaven and
> Earth on TV. Basically, and breifly it is a fairly recent samurai
> movie that is in part based on the struggles between Takeda
> Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin. I taped it, and really enjoy it. I
am
> now looking for it on DVD, but cannot find it under Heaven and
> Earth, all I get is the Oliver Stone one. I remeber a while back
on
> here someone metioning it by a different title. If anyone knows
it
> please help. Thanks

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help with a Movie title
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. Uhm, something that has always caused me to wonder: We talk about the Fourth Battle of Kawanakajima, but what happened to the first THREE?  I m not trying
messages.messageBody:
Hi.
Uhm, something that has always caused me to wonder: We talk about the
Fourth Battle of Kawanakajima, but what happened to the first THREE? I'm not
trying to be a smart@$$, but it's something I have wondered about. Thanks.

Later,
Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help with a Movie title
messages.msgSnippet: There is a film about Takeda Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin named Kagetora , which as all of you know was the name of kenshin before being adopted by the uesugi
messages.messageBody:
There is a film about Takeda Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin named "Kagetora", which as all of you know was the name of kenshin before being adopted by the uesugi clan; it has quite good photography and fighting scenes, and a representation of the 4th battle of Kawanakajima, featuring a personal duel between Shingen and Kenshin; is that it?, it was produced by MGM.
Hope this helps.
Edwin.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help with a Movie title
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.gotterdammerung.org/film/reviews/h/heaven-and-earth.html I ve tried to find it too.  Go to the above link.  You ll find more information about it
messages.messageBody:
http://www.gotterdammerung.org/film/reviews/h/heaven-and-earth.html

I've tried to find it too. Go to the above link. You'll find more
information about it there. The creator of this page; however, was less
than thrilled about the movie. I know the VHS version exists (but for
around 79.00). I think it was at Amazon.com but I'm probably wrong. Good
luck searching.

Chuck

messages.subject: Help with a Movie title
messages.msgSnippet: Awhile back I saw a movie that I saw was entitled Heaven and Earth on TV.  Basically, and breifly it is a fairly recent samurai movie that is in part based on
messages.messageBody:
Awhile back I saw a movie that I saw was entitled Heaven and
Earth on TV. Basically, and breifly it is a fairly recent samurai
movie that is in part based on the struggles between Takeda
Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin. I taped it, and really enjoy it. I am
now looking for it on DVD, but cannot find it under Heaven and
Earth, all I get is the Oliver Stone one. I remeber a while back on
here someone metioning it by a different title. If anyone knows it
please help. Thanks
